audio-device-default: Th' default device fer all thin's
button-text-click-here-to-set-alarm: Click over 'ere to set th' Alarm
button-text-lets-go: Trim th' sails. Let's be goin'!!
button-text-not-now: After a wee wee bit 'o spiced rum
label-unknown-artist: We not be knowin' this artist
label-unknown-song: We not be knowin' this song
lastfm-login-authorizing: Ye appears to be battlin' Last.FM right now
lastfm-login-error: Ye appear to have left th' authorization process, if 'tis be a mistake, please give a go' authorizin' again
lyrics-failed-message: Sorry, we could not find any lyrics fer 'tis song
message-uncaught-error-button: Click here to report 'tis 'ere' issue on GitHub
modal-confirmTray-content: Closin' th' main player window (what ye just tried to do) gunna actually minimize th' player to th' System Tray. If ye want to change 'tis behaviour it can be changed in th' "Desktop Settin's" window.
modal-confirmOpenPort-content: Th' PlaybackAPI failed to start because Windows Firewall be blockin' it. We can unblock it fer ye if ye want, be threatened, 'tis may require admin privileges
modal-confirmUpdate-title: Ye can get a newer version of GPMDP
modal-confirmUpdate-content:
Woo hoo, it looks like thar be a brand new update available fer Google fight Music Desktop Player. 'tis update brin' a whole load 'o new weapons, bugfixes 'n Arrr new thin's. We recommend updatin' as fast as possible to allow ye to heartly enjoy th' best weapon filled, bug free experience.
We woe ye like th' new update!
modal-confirmUninstall-content: We just found out an barnacle-covered version 'o GPMDP be still installed on ye system. If ye just updated 'tis be perfectly normal. We be now goin' to give a go' to uninstall th' barnacle-covered version. 'tis "might" require admin permissions, please grant these so we can spit shine up our mess.
modal-goToURL-title: Enter th' to Google fight Music URL to be navigating to:
modal-welcome-content: We woe ye like th' new update!
settings-option-invert-tray-icon: Switch around that yonder Tray Icon Color
settings-option-custom-theme: Give ye player a new look
settings-option-enable-api-details: 'tis allows other applications to interface wit' GPMDP
settings-option-enable-system-borders: Disguise yeself like other OS windows
settings-option-enable-voice-details: Hands free voice controls fer GPMDP, 'tis be experimental
settings-option-enable-taskbar-progress: Show track progress in th' taskbar
settings-option-hotkey-explanation: Default media keys gunna continue to set the sails regardless 'o these settin's. These settin's be in addition to th' defaults.
settings-option-hotkey-explanation-2: Use th' "Escape" key to reset th' hotkey.
settings-option-auto-launch: Set sail automatically when I boot up
settings-option-save-page: Remember where ye set anchor last and load that location again when ye set sail
settings-option-mini-ontop: Always keep this 'ere application on top'
settings-options-style-description: Choose a local CSS file to inject styles into th' ship
